title: Luxtrous Genuine Clipper Butane Gas Multipurpose Universal Refill Fluid for Lighters, BBQ, and Cooking - 300ml Capacity - Reliable & Safe Fuel Solution(Pack of 2)
features: BUTANE COMPOSITION: Clipper butane gas refills boast a superior composition, guaranteeing high quality and optimal performance. The gas burns cleanly, generating a consistent flame while minimizing the risk of clogging. This composition also extends the lifespan of lighters and various equipment.

UNIVERSAL REFILLABLE: Designed to be compatible with standard lighters, torch lighters, and butane-fueled cooking equipment, this product offers universal refill capability. Users can enjoy the convenience of a single fuel type for various applications, promoting cost savings.

RELIABLE PERFORMANCE: Clipper's genuine butane gas is renowned for its reliability, providing a steady and consistent flame output. Ideal for camping, picnicking, or tailgating, its compact size and portability allow you to enjoy your favorite grilled foods wherever you go.

SAFETY FEATURES: Genuine Clipper Butane Gas prioritizes safety with built-in features that prevent leaks and mishaps. The nozzle design ensures a secure fit with the receiving valve, reducing the risk of gas leakage during refills.

EASY TO INSTALL: Featuring a self-sealing Safety Valve, installation is a breeze with no spluttering or spitting during use. The gas bottle can be safely removed and re-attached, even if not completely empty. CAUTIONS: Store away from direct sunlight, keep out of reach of children, and avoid exposure to temperatures exceeding 50°C.
description: Product Description Premium Clipper Butane Gas For Lighters The Clipper Butane Gas in a 300ml size is meticulously crafted to seamlessly fit into your backpack, camping essentials, or tool bag. Its compact dimensions ensure that it occupies minimal space, yet delivers optimal functionality. The effortless and consistent ignition of your lighters, torches, and appliances with the Clipper Gas 300ml Butane Gas Refill. The refill is designed to be lightweight, adding negligible weight to your gear, making it the perfect choice for travelers and outdoor enthusiasts. With a generous 300ml volume per refill, this product offers outstanding value for your money and diminishes the need for frequent replacements. The lightweight and compact design make it an indispensable travel companion, allowing you to maintain uncompromised ignition power even when away from home. Premium Butane Formula The Premium Butane Clipper gas formula is a proprietary blend of purified butane with added propane for optimal performance. This precise mixture ensures clean burning, minimal impurities, and consistent pressure, ideal for powering Clipper lighters and other precision applications. Easy to use The user-friendly design of the refill canister ensures effortless handling and control while refilling. With a dependable filling valve, leaks and wastage are minimized, simplifying the refilling process for a hassle-free experience. Generous 300ml Capacity With an ample 300ml capacity, this gas refill provides an extended supply of butane , minimizing the need for frequent refills. Whether you're lighting candles, firing up your grill, or using a torch, this refill has you covered. Effortless Refilling :- Designed for user-friendly refilling, the canister's ergonomic build ensures a comfortable grip during the refilling process . The advanced filling valve minimizes leaks, making each refill smooth and efficient. Toss it into your bag, glove compartment, or toolbox – it's designed to be effortlessly transported , ready to serve whenever needed. In your workshop or kitchen drawer, the compact design ensures it won't take up valuable space , yet remains a powerful ignition tool.
